statements: UPDATE StemCellResearchInstitutions SET institution_name = 'Johns Hopkins University', location = 'Baltimore' WHERE institution_id = 1;
UPDATE StemCellResearchInstitutions SET research_focus = 'Embryonic Stem Cells', location = 'California' WHERE institution_id = 2;
UPDATE StemCellResearchInstitutions SET location = 'New York', research_focus = 'Regenerative Medicine' WHERE institution_id = 1;
UPDATE StemCellResearchInstitutions SET research_focus = 'Bioinformatics', location = 'California' WHERE institution_id = 2;
UPDATE stemcell_research_institutions SET location = 'California' WHERE institution_id = 1;
UPDATE research_projects SET end_date = '2023-06-30' WHERE lead_researcher = 'Dr. Smith';
UPDATE stemcell_research_institutions SET location = 'New Location', established_year = 2005 WHERE institution_id = 1;
UPDATE research_projects SET lead_researcher = 'Dr. John Smith', start_date = '2023-01-15', end_date = '2025-12-31' WHERE project_id = 5;
UPDATE Institutions SET location='New Location' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Researchers SET institution_id=2, title='Senior Researcher' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE Institutions SET name = 'New University', location = 'New City' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ResearchProjects SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE researchers SET institution = 'University of XYZ' WHERE researcher_id = 1;
UPDATE samples SET donor_id = 1002, collection_date = '2023-06-15 10:30:00' WHERE sample_id = 5;
UPDATE researchers SET name = 'John Doe', institution = 'University A' WHERE researcher_id = 1;
UPDATE samples SET preservation_method = 'Freezing' WHERE sample_id = 3;
UPDATE Institutes SET contact_email = 'institute@example.com' WHERE institute_id = 1;
UPDATE Researchers SET field_of_research = 'Bioinformatics' WHERE researcher_id = 2;
UPDATE Institutes SET address='123 Main St', contact_email='info@example.com' WHERE institute_id=1;
